subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Vera Zvonareva and Svetlana Kuznetsova gave defending champion Russia a 2-0 lead in the Fed Cup final on Saturday by winning the opening singles matches in Madrid against Anabel Medina Garriques and Carla Suárez Navarro of Spain. ¶Carlos Moyà defeated top-seeded Richard Gasquet of France, 6-2, 6-4, to reach the final of the BCR Open Romania in Bucharest. He will play the defending champion, Gilles Simon of France, who defeated eighth-seeded José Acasuso of Argentina, 4-6, 7-6 (4), 6-4. moya (AP).
